transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello. Hello. Haanji sir good morning.

Executive: Kaun bol rahe hain madam?

Customer: Neha baat kar rahi thi sir main IndiaMART se.

Executive: Achcha achcha. Main keh raha hu maine kuch order liya tha abhi ek madam se.

Customer: Um.

Executive: Kya kehte hain, haan Delhi ki hain. Toh unhone hume sab order de diya, ek order de diya tha toh woh confirm ho gaya unka. Ab dusra order diya unhone boxers mein, dikkat mein hai sab mere paas screenshot wagera. Ab woh keh rahi humne is cheez ka order nahi diya aapko. Sabke graph wagera sab unhone bana ke diya hai. Ab maal lene ko mana kar rahi boli hum nahi lenge hum complaint kar denge hum case kar denge hum yeh kar denge woh kar denge. Toh sir bol rahe hain abhi madam se woh sir ko de diya number unhone.

Toh keh rahe nahi humne diya hi nahi order sabke mere paas invoice wagera Inaya Handicraft ki bana ke di gayi hai unhone advance bhi dala hai mujhe us cheez ka. Yeh aapka fala order ka advance hai. Ab woh yeh keh rahe hain humne yeh cheez nahi di hum dusri cheez di hai. Sabke unhone jo sketch bana ke bheja hai ki yeh sketch hai isme yeh cheeze hain yeh dibba hai isme rakhni hai yeh dibba iska banana hai toh screenshot wagera sab. Ab woh manne ko raazi nahi boli nahi lenge. Hum toh yeh kar denge hum toh woh kar denge.

Executive: Uh, ek baar sir mujhe apni company ka naam batao proper main check karti hu. Inaya Handicraft. Inaya Handicraft.

Customer: Ek minute sir.

(silence)

Executive: Maine aapka catalog toh open kiya hai sir yaha pe. Agar jaise aapki kisi se baat wagera hui hai na toh unhone matlab aapki baat hui hogi proper ki order wagera lene hai ki nahi lene hai saari cheeze hain. Hai na? Toh aapke paas koi invoice hoga koi order aapne banaya hoga ya kuch aisi cheez hogi na? Kyunki agar main yaha pe dekhu toh mere paas as such koi bhi uh complaint nahi aayi hui hai aapke khilaaf yaha pe agar main bolu. Matlab jo lady aapko bol rahi hai.

Customer: Nahi woh toh complaint nahi kar raha woh yeh keh raha hai ki main yeh case karunga yeh nahi pata nahi kya kya baatein bana raha hai bolte sir jo item hai aapka jo aapne order diya woh toh lena padega bole aap yaha par jaoge mat manne ke pahuchane ke toh mana thodi kar rahe ho. Main toh khud keh raha hu aap maal uthao payment do.

Executive: Achcha. But yeh hamare paas as such koi bhi information nahi aayi hui hai.

Customer: Nahi aayi lekin iska agar procedure kya hai matlab galat keh raha hai na woh. Main toh maal dene ko tayar hu maal le lo paise le lo. Ab woh keh raha hai maal nahi chahiye hume.

Executive: Hmm, abhi woh mana matlab kyu kar rahe hain as such?

Customer: Keh rahe hain yeh galat banaya aapne matlab yeh cheez jo humne batai thi woh nahi banayi. Sabke maine sab unko unhone khud hi graph bana ke bheja apne haath se sketch bana hua unka. Boli yeh banana hai isme beech mein aise rakhna hai.

Executive: Achcha. Toh abhi matlab unke accordingly product aapka nahi bana toh isliye woh mana kar rahi hain?

Customer: Nahi product bana hai. Product tayar haan unke accordingly accordingly bana unke phir ab unko kya matlab kya samjha haan ab kya dimag mein unke yeh toh pata nahi mujhe jo mujhe sketch bana ke diya gaya haath se graph wohi toh banaya woh banaya maine.

Executive: Achcha woh matlab usko uske according nahi bana kitne ka order tha sir?

Customer: Woh hai lagbhag 45 haan 44 plus ka 45000 ka lagbhag.

Executive: 45000 ka aapka order tha. 44000 44 44.

Executive: Achcha. Kyunki sir yaha pe pata kya hota hai aapka main aapko ek cheez bata deti hu agar aapki client ke saath koi bhi baat wagera hui hai na toh agar toh unhone matlab as such jaise aapko bol rahi hain ki main matlab aise case kar dungi ya kuch bhi aisa hota hai toh woh hamara buyer supply conflict mein aata hai. Toh uske liye hamari ek proper team hoti hai. Agar ki agar hamare paas aapke against koi complaint aati hai kuch bhi aisa hota hai toh hamari team us pe work karti hai aur woh sort out karwa ke deti hai. Toh abhi agar aap bologe ki as such Neha koi matlab complaint waha chahiye toh mere paas abhi tak koi complaint nahi aayi hai.

Customer: Nahi toh maine bata diya aapko yeh masla hai baaki jab baat isliye main baat kar raha hu unse boli maine bata diya.

Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aap aapke paas mera number bhi tha I think Neha ke naam se hoga na account manager hu aapki. Toh agar aap 9696 pe call karte ho ya mere number pe karte ho mere paas hi aapka catalog aata hai aur aapka call aata hai. Toh maine aapko last time yeh cheez boli thi ki sir kuch bhi aisa hota hai aapka jo catalog hota hai woh mere through hi jaana hota hai kahin na kahin.

Toh woh saari cheeze jo hoti hai woh mere paas hi hoti hai toh aapko jab bhi koi aise Badalte rehte hain na aapke yaha manager badalte rehte hain na kabhi koi padta hai abhi koi Jain thi hai woh karti hai unki bhasha kabhi samajh mein nahi aati kya kehna chah rahi hai kuch samajh mein nahi aata.

Executive: Haan mujhe nahi nahi woh toh mere manager hai agar unko language nahi samajh aati hai toh koi dikkat nahi hai aap mere saath baat kiya karo. Mera number toh aapke paas hai in fact main aapko call bhi kar rahi thi kaafi time se kyunki hamari jab baat hui thi toh maine aapko bola tha ki sir by leads wagera aap use kar rahe hain kya feedback hai maine aapko guide bhi kiya tha na saari cheezein.

Customer: Woh sab cheeze maine kari hai toh uske hisab se woh kar liya tha maine jo bhi aapne bataya tha dekh uske hisab se. Toh uske hisab se kuch na kuch toh matlab hua hai na aise inquiry toh badhi hai kyunki main dekh rahi thi connect news thoda kam kar rahe the. Abhi tak calls wagera ka proper response kar rahe hain saari cheeze dekh rahi hain woh bhi cheeze hain.

Executive: Ab kuch kuch calls usme aisi bhi aa rahi hain jo ke woh yahi Muradabad ke bole humse yeh le lo toh milte hum toh khud bech rahe hain do char calls usme aisi aayi hain.

Executive: Achcha achcha.

Executive: Theek hai. Ab mujhe ek cheez batao sir yaha pe mujhe na brass picture frames wagera ki na ek lead dikh rahi thi matlab aap consume kar rahe ho but woh category aapke product mein added nahi hai. Toh usko add karna hai ki nahi karna hai mujhe batao. Brass picture frame.

Customer: Kaun si?

Executive: Haan brass picture frame toh karte hain kar glass picture frame karte hain.

Customer: Glass and metal mein hota hai woh.

Executive: Brass and metal se aata hai na?

Executive: Theek hai main isko add kar deti hu aur baaki sir matlab abhi kaisa chal raha hai overall agar main matlab dekhu toh kyunki meri toh baat hi nahi hui uske baad se aap aapke saath.

Customer: Abhi toh sir kaam dhandha sahi hai bahut na ke barabar hai ek aadha lead aati hai ek lead samajhiye consume hoti hai ek mahina ho gaya lagbhag unse baat ek mahina lagbhag. Ek din unko maal bhi diya tha maine 15-16000 ka ab unhone yeh order diya tha do order the inke ek order le rahe hain ek order keh rahe hain hum nahi lenge.

Executive: Achcha ek order le rahe hain ek order nahi le rahe hain. Haan.

Executive: Koi baat nahi agar aisa kuch hoga na ya woh matlab kuch bhi aisa complaint kare ya such kuch bhi aisa hoga toh woh hamare paas hi aati hai. Toh jaise hi aati hai toh main saath ke saath aapko inform kar dungi ki aisa kuch hua hai. Otherwise agar aisa hota toh main aapko subah hi call kar deti ki sir aisi complaint aayi hai aapke khilaaf ya kuch aisa hota hai. Woh hamari team handle karti hai. Woh matlab hamari buyer supply conflict wali team hoti hai na woh aur main aapko request kar rahi hu sir please mera number aapke paas hai aap sirf jab bhi koi dikkat ho kuch bhi ho mere number pe call karo kyunki aana kahin na kahin mere paas hi hota hai.

Customer: Chaliye.

Executive: Theek hai toh aapka aapke aapne 9696 pe call kiya na ki concern raise ho gaya tha mere paas. Toh agar aapki call solve ho gayi hai toh main isko close kar sakti hu?

Customer: Ji ji kar dijiye.

Executive: Theek hai aapke paas feedback aayega na sir positive feedback de dijiyega aur ek cheez aur discuss karni thi mujhe agar aap free honge aaj toh mujhe ek baar video meeting pe aana hai aapke saath kyunki do teen cheeze maine discuss karni thi aapki performance wagera na jo bhi ratings hai aapki ya saari cheeze hain kaisa chal raha hai kaisa nahi woh saari discuss karni thi.

Customer: Theek hai ji.

Executive: Abhi toh filhaal theek hi chal rahi hai aapki ratings October mein hi aapne li thi 4.6 ki rating hai abhi by leads ka bhi sahi aa rahi hai by leads ya kya cheez hai quantity wagera ka koi dikkat toh nahi aa rahi aapko?

Customer: By leads ka maal matlab ki jo cheez hum bech rahe hain woh aa nahi rahi.

Executive: Achcha woh nahi aa rahi hai. Kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai?

Customer: Jo hamare product hai usse alag aa rahi hai na jo cheez hum bech rahe hain woh nahi aa rahi.

Executive: Hmm. Aapne recent mein check kari kyunki mujhe yaha pe kaafi leads dikh rahi hai jaise aapke product ke regarding photo frame full size karke ho gaya aapka phir metal key chains ho gaya wooden frames wagera ho gayi hain. Theek hai yeh saari cheeze hain yaha pe dekho.

Customer: Haan recent mein jo dekh rahe hain usme yeh hai ek lead aayi hai photo frame full size toh yeh MDF ki nahi hoti hamare paas.

Executive: Achcha woh particular categories nahi hai. Baaki toh as such matlab dekho consumption ka na thoda fresh lead consume kar rahe ho jaise maine aapko last time bola tha ki sir recent pe focus karo. Toh recent wali lead toh mujhe kaafi dikh rahi hai yaha pe ki aapki matlab chal rahi hain 93% ke around aapne consumption kiya hi hai. Calls bhi aap utha rahe ho proper jitni bhi aapko aati hain. Last month aapko aayi thi 12 mil hui hain is mahine toh teen hi aayi hain mere khayal se hai na abhi tak.

Executive: Theek hai sir ek baar aap free ho jaana mujhe batana main aapko do teen categories wagera thodi update karwa dungi aur ek baar catalog view dekh liyo sir aapka woh achcha aaya hua hai. Theek hai toh abhi main close kar du sir aapka concern yeh?

Customer: Ji kar dijiye.

Executive: Haan theek hai please sir mere number pe call kijiyega next time. Theek hai?

Customer: Bilkul bilkul.

Executive: Okay sir thank you.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received an order, buyer now refusing.

- Buyer threatening complaint and legal action.

- Wants to know procedure for buyer/seller conflict.

- By leads are not relevant to products.



Resolution:

- Executive checked account, no complaints found.

- Explained buyer/seller conflict resolution process.

- Offered to update product categories.

- Will inform if buyer files a complaint.

- Will schedule a video meeting to discuss performance.

- Closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide positive feedback.

- Customer will inform when free for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

complaint, case

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- order, complaint, legal action, by leads, product categories
